title: Head of a Hippopotamus
medium: Travertine (Egyptian alabaster) with traces of gesso and red pigment
dimensions: H. 14 cm (5 1/2 in); W. 12.2 cm (4 13/16 in); D. from back to jaw 15.2 cm (6 in)
creditLine: Metropolitan Museum of Art. Purchase, Harris Brisbane Dick Fund, Lila Acheson Wallace Gift, Gift of Henry Walters, by exchange, Ludlow Bull Fund, Beatrice Cooper Gift, and funds from various donors, 1997
